dcterms:creator: P. Knees
M. Schedl
dcterms:description: The AllMusic dataset is utilized to investigate the similarity between artists and music, particularly focusing on the long-tail phenomenon in music retrieval and recommendation.
dcterms:title: AllMusic dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Schindler
P. Knees
dcterms:description: The music similarity dataset is used to verify the validity of the Long-Tail Friendly Representation Framework (LTFRF) on music, containing a significant number of music pieces and similarity relationships.
dcterms:title: Music similarity dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Liang
Z. Minshu
P.E. Daniel
dcterms:description: The user-artist interaction dataset is built from user interaction data, focusing on artist-related user data to enhance collaborative music recommendation.
dcterms:title: User-artist interaction dataset
